about_the_game:
About the Game

Heroes Survival is a game that challenges players to become the strongest heroes.
Collect diamonds through play to upgrade your hero and grow into a stronger hero. Play with skill and upgraded heroes to make your hero the strongest hero in the world!

Function

  • Manual aiming mode is recommended as the default, and there is an automatic aiming option.
  • 14 heroes and skills (Red, Brian, others)
  • 90 items to choose from (rainbow, cheetah, and more)
  • Acquire diamonds to strengthen your heroes
  • You must survive each wave for 20 to 60 seconds
  • Represent your country and challenge your hero to become a top ranker.

short_description: Heroes Survival is a shooting roguelike game where you become a hero, grow and survive by hunting monsters. Become the strongest hero among players by creating various builds using various skills, weapons, and items!
